about_the_game:
ITS TIME TO GET HARD

You are on the edge of the bed, she's ready but you are too stressed out to perform?

THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU
This next generation simulation of the most stressful situation in life gets you the training you need. Get stress resistant and get it hard as fast as you can!

GAMEPLAY

Get it hard is a small, singleplayer pixel-art arcade game. It is very fast-paced and quite stressful. You can play in two diffrent game-modes where you have to find the random keys on the keyboard in order to get it hard. You get timed by how fast you can get up, so this little arcade game is also speedrum compatible.
Get it hard, as fast as you can!
Find the right keys in two different modes:
  • Numbers
  • Alphabet

Mash and beat your keyboard as you race against the timer and beat your highscore!

As a bonus you get great (beginner) Pixel-Art visuals with cutting edge animations. You will feel the stress like in real life situations. So get used to it and train to get it hard the next time you need it!

More features include:
  • keyboard and mouse support
  • music and sound-effects
  • particle effects
  • built-in timer
  • made with godot game-engine
  • indie-developer

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nude and erotic pixel-art of humans.

name: Get it Hard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GTX 760
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GTX 760
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
